# Landing Page Wireframe Structure

## 1. Hero Section
--------------------------------------------------
[ LOGO ]                                [ NAV ]
--------------------------------------------------
Headline: [Clear Value Prop - 6-10 words]
Subheadline: [Specific Benefit + Objection Handling]

[ PRIMARY CTA BUTTON ]    [ Secondary Link ]

[ Hero Image / Video showing product in action ]
--------------------------------------------------
[ Social Proof Bar: Logos of 5+ customers ]
--------------------------------------------------

## 2. Problem/Agitation
--------------------------------------------------
Heading: Is [Problem] slowing you down?

[ Icon 1 ]          [ Icon 2 ]          [ Icon 3 ]
Pain Point 1        Pain Point 2        Pain Point 3
Description...      Description...      Description...
--------------------------------------------------

## 3. Solution/How It Works
--------------------------------------------------
Heading: The new way to [Result]

Step 1: [Action] -> [Benefit]
[ Image/Screenshot ]

Step 2: [Action] -> [Benefit]
[ Image/Screenshot ]

Step 3: [Action] -> [Benefit]
[ Image/Screenshot ]
--------------------------------------------------

## 4. Social Proof/Testimonials
--------------------------------------------------
"Quote from customer about specific result."
- Name, Title, Company
[ Stars ]

"Another quote focusing on a different benefit."
- Name, Title, Company
[ Stars ]
--------------------------------------------------

## 5. FAQ
--------------------------------------------------
Q: [Common Objection 1]?
A: [Direct Answer]

Q: [Common Objection 2]?
A: [Direct Answer]
--------------------------------------------------

## 6. Final CTA
--------------------------------------------------
Heading: Ready to [Result]?
Subhead: Join [Number] others today.

[ PRIMARY CTA BUTTON ]
[ Guarantee / Risk Reversal ]
--------------------------------------------------
[ Footer Links ]
--------------------------------------------------
